attributes.comment:
Just wanted to place a comment related to the possible increase in the
fingerprinting fee and USCIS filing fee. My husband and I are in the process of
adopting a baby from China. We logged in to China in April of 2006, but
unfortunately the wait has become very long. Along with the extended wait time,
the total adoption cost will be affected due to the need for re-filing,
re-fingerprinting and an updated home study. These factors can not be changed,
however any increase in fees will make the refiling even more costly. I ask you
to please reconsider the fee increase. If there must be an increase, would it
be possible to exempt those who are in a situation like us and simply not apply
the new increased amount for those refiling? Thank you for your time and
consideration.
Sheila Johnson

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Sheila S. Johnson
